name: CentLing Technologies
description:
CentLing Technologies is a high-tech IT powerhouse established in 2009 in Qingdao, Shandong, China to support both applications development and integration of services for global markets. 
Our business directives are to provide world-class IT software systems, innovative products, and end-to-end solutions to Fortune 500 customers. Our business portfolio focuses on communication, mobile Internet and enterprise solutions based off Industry 4.0 standards. 

The Company has over 500 experienced engineers and management teams of advanced degrees and diverse marketing backgrounds. The project, quality, security and environment managements strongly adhere to high standards governed by ISO and CMMI guidelines and practices.
